item.description: Third annual holiday party! Gifts, surprises, activities, food and lots of fun! Details to come. Show up between 11 and 12 to stake out a spot and help set up. The bulk of our celebration will be from 12-4; we'll wind up by 5 p.m. See details on the Message Board.
item.how_to_find_us: Khaki apron, name tag, probably wearing something glittery

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: December 2009 NE ATC+ Regular Monthly Meetup in Needham
